name: referme-backend
description: referme-backend/ │── src/ │   ├── models/         # Sequelize models (Database tables) │   ├── migrations/     # Database migration files │   ├── seeders/        # Dummy data for testing │   ├── routes/         # API route definitions │   ├── controllers/    # Business logic for each route │   ├── services/       # Reusable services (e.g., authentication, payments) │   ├── middlewares/    # Express middlewares (e.g., authentication) │   ├── config/         # Database configuration │   ├── app.js          # Express app setup │   ├── server.js       # Entry point │── .env                # Environment variables (DB credentials, secrets) │── package.json        # Dependencies and scripts │── README.md           # Documentation
